message.body: If your home on Sunday, season premiere of game of thrones. Come and watch it we got a new TV just for the occasion!!
You are funny! New TV for the Game of Thrones. I have free HBO this weekend. You reminded me
Thought that would get your attention!but seriously we can have a game of thrones party if you decide to come.
I will let you know. Mom here again. Might be able to get away!
So far so good. Think she is starting to lose some hair. We go Monday for wig. Another busy week!
